system.availability: Common includes: 40-person barracks, commissary, medicae facility, comms hub (with vox + auspex arrays), two storage sheds, small generator, and landing pad. Good also: surrounding bulwark and two defence platforms with twin-linked Heavy Stubbers. Best also: Laboratory Facility.
system.cost: Pre-Fabricated Hab blocks can be set up by landing craft or drop pods.  Can connect to each other to form a base of operations that protects against the outside environment.
